targets.rawSql:
select hiu.host, hu.value from (
SELECT hi.host,hi.name, hi.itemid, max(hu.clock) clock FROM (
SELECT h.host, i.itemid, i.name FROM items i, hosts h WHERE i.hostid=h.hostid and i.name = "Free disk space on /oracle" and h.host like "$database%") hi, 
history_uint hu WHERE hi.itemid = hu.itemid GROUP BY hi.host, hi.name, hi.itemid DESC) hiu, 
history_uint hu WHERE hiu.clock = hu.clock AND hiu.itemid = hu.itemid order by hiu.host

select a.n name,
max(case when a.name like "% Used Size" then value else 0 end) used,
#max(case when a.name like "% Free Size" then value else 0 end) free,
max(case when a.name like "% Total Size" then value else 0 end) total,
max(case when a.name like "% Used Percent" then value else 0 end) pused
#max(case when a.name like "% Free Percent" then value else 0 end) pfree
from(
select substring_index(hi.name, " ", 1) n, hi.name, hu.value from (select i.name, i.itemid, max(h.clock) clock from 
(select itemid, name from items where hostid = $hostid and name like "% Size" and templateid is null) i,
history_uint h where i.itemid = h.itemid group by i.name, i.itemid desc) hi, history_uint hu where hi.clock = hu.clock and hi.itemid = hu.itemid
union all
select substring_index(hi.name, " ", 1) n, hi.name, hu.value from (select i.name, i.itemid, max(h.clock) clock from 
(select itemid, name from items where hostid = $hostid and name like "% Percent" and templateid is null) i,
history h where i.itemid = h.itemid group by i.name, i.itemid desc) hi, history hu where hi.clock = hu.clock and hi.itemid = hu.itemid
) a
group by a.n order by a.n

select cast(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 1) as char(20)) a,cast(substring_index(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 2), '##', -1) as char(20)) b, cast(substring_index(tt.context, '##', -1) as signed) c from
(SELECT substring_index(substring_index(t.context, '####', b.help_topic_id + 1), '####', -1) context FROM (
select hu.value context from (select i.name, i.itemid, max(h.clock) clock from 
(select itemid, name from items where hostid = "$hostid" and name = "Big Object List") i,
history_text h where i.itemid = h.itemid group by i.name, i.itemid desc) hi, history_text hu where hi.clock = hu.clock and hi.itemid = hu.itemid) t
JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ((LENGTH(t.context) - LENGTH(REPLACE(t.context, '####', '')))/4)) tt

select cast(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 1) as char(20)) a,cast(substring_index(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 2), '##', -1) as decimal(10,2)) b, cast(substring_index(tt.context, '##', -1) as signed) c from
(SELECT substring_index(substring_index(t.context, '####', b.help_topic_id + 1), '####', -1) context
FROM (SELECT hu.value context
FROM (  SELECT i.name, i.itemid, max(h.clock) clock
FROM (SELECT itemid, name FROM items  WHERE hostid = "$hostid" AND name = "Oracle Bak Info") i,
history_text h WHERE i.itemid = h.itemid GROUP BY i.name, i.itemid DESC) hi,
history_text hu WHERE hi.clock = hu.clock AND hi.itemid = hu.itemid) t
JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ((LENGTH(t.context) - LENGTH(REPLACE(t.context, '####', '')))/4)) tt

select cast(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 1) as char(20)) a,cast(substring_index(tt.context, '##', -1) as signed) b from
(SELECT substring_index(substring_index(t.context, '####', b.help_topic_id + 1), '####', -1) context FROM (
select hu.value context from (select i.name, i.itemid, max(h.clock) clock from 
(select itemid, name from items where hostid = "$hostid" and name = "Host Login Count") i,
history_text h where i.itemid = h.itemid group by i.name, i.itemid desc) hi, history_text hu where hi.clock = hu.clock and hi.itemid = hu.itemid) t
JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ((LENGTH(t.context) - LENGTH(REPLACE(t.context, '####', '')))/4)) tt order by 2 desc

seriesOverrides.alias: edu3oracloud169: Network traffic on eth1 outing
edu3oracloud170: Network traffic on eth1 outing
edu3oracloud171: Network traffic on eth1 outing
edu3oracloud172: Network traffic on eth1 outing

targets.rawSql:
select ttt.a, ttt.b, ttt.c, ttt.d, ttt.e, ttt.f from (select cast(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 1) as char(20)) a,cast(substring_index(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 2), '##', -1) as char(20)) b,
cast(substring_index(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 3), '##', -1) as signed) c,
cast(substring_index(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 4), '##', -1) as char(20)) d,
cast(substring_index(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 5), '##', -1) as signed) e,
cast(substring_index(tt.context, '##', -1) as char(50)) f from
(SELECT substring_index(substring_index(t.context, '####', b.help_topic_id + 1), '####', -1) context FROM (
select hu.value context from (select i.name, i.itemid, max(h.clock) clock from 
(select itemid, name from items where hostid = "$hostid" and name = "User Info") i,
history_text h where i.itemid = h.itemid group by i.name, i.itemid desc) hi, history_text hu where hi.clock = hu.clock and hi.itemid = hu.itemid) t
JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ((LENGTH(t.context) - LENGTH(REPLACE(t.context, '####', '')))/4)) tt) ttt order by ttt.e

select CONCAT(cast(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 1) as char(2)),':',cast(substring_index(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 2), '##', -1) as char(2000))) b from
(SELECT substring_index(substring_index(t.context, '####', b.help_topic_id + 1), '####', -1) context FROM (
select hu.value context from (select i.name, i.itemid, max(h.clock) clock from 
(select itemid, name from items where hostid = "$hostid" and name like "Busy SQL List%") i,
history_text h where i.itemid = h.itemid group by i.name, i.itemid desc) hi, history_text hu where hi.clock = hu.clock and hi.itemid = hu.itemid) t
JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ((LENGTH(t.context) - LENGTH(REPLACE(t.context, '####', '')))/4)) tt

select cast(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 1) as signed) a,cast(substring_index(substring_index(tt.context, '##', 2), '##', -1) as signed) b, cast(substring_index(tt.context, '##', -1) as char(10)) c from
(SELECT substring_index(substring_index(t.context, '####', b.help_topic_id + 1), '####', -1) context
FROM (select hu.value context from (select i.name, i.itemid, max(h.clock) clock from 
(select itemid, name from items where hostid = "$hostid" and name = "Oracle Bak List") i,
history_text h where i.itemid = h.itemid group by i.name, i.itemid desc) hi, history_text hu where hi.clock = hu.clock and hi.itemid = hu.itemid) t
JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ((LENGTH(t.context) - LENGTH(REPLACE(t.context, '####', '')))/4)) tt order by 1 desc

SELECT
  t.clock as time_sec,
  t.value value,
  "Incoming" as metric
FROM(
select value, clock from history_uint h where h.itemid = (
select itemid from items where hostid = (
select hostid from hosts where host = 
(select case when "$database" like "%cloud" then "edu3gfs19x" when "$database" like "%act" then "edu3gfs25x" else "edu3gfs22x" end host from dual) ) and name = "Incoming network traffic on eth1"
) and clock > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TIMESTAMPADD(hour,-12,curtime()))
) t
ORDER BY t.clock ASC

SELECT
  t.clock as time_sec,
  t.value value,
  "Outing" as metric
FROM(
select value, clock from history_uint h where h.itemid = (
select itemid from items where hostid = (
select hostid from hosts where host = 
(select case when "$database" like "%cloud" then "edu3gfs19x" when "$database" like "%act" then "edu3gfs25x" else "edu3gfs22x" end host from dual) ) and name = "Outgoing network traffic on eth1"
) and clock > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TIMESTAMPADD(hour,-12,curtime()))
) t
ORDER BY t.clock ASC

SELECT
  t.clock as time_sec,
  t.value value,
  "Incoming" as metric
FROM(
select value, clock from history_uint h where h.itemid = (
select itemid from items where hostid = (
select hostid from hosts where host = 
(select case when "$database" like "%cloud" then "edu3gfs20x" when "$database" like "%act" then "edu3gfs26x" else "edu3gfs23x" end host from dual) ) and name = "Incoming network traffic on eth1"
) and clock > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TIMESTAMPADD(hour,-12,curtime()))
) t
ORDER BY t.clock ASC

SELECT
  t.clock as time_sec,
  t.value value,
  "Outing" as metric
FROM(
select value, clock from history_uint h where h.itemid = (
select itemid from items where hostid = (
select hostid from hosts where host = 
(select case when "$database" like "%cloud" then "edu3gfs20x" when "$database" like "%act" then "edu3gfs26x" else "edu3gfs23x" end host from dual) ) and name = "Outgoing network traffic on eth1"
) and clock > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TIMESTAMPADD(hour,-12,curtime()))
) t
ORDER BY t.clock ASC

list.name: database
list.query: select h.host from hosts_templates ht, hosts h where ht.templateid=10334 and ht.hostid = h.hostid

list.name: host
list.query: select h.host from hosts_templates ht, hosts h where ht.templateid=10334 and ht.hostid = h.hostid and h.host like "$database%";

list.name: hostid
list.query: select h.hostid from hosts_templates ht, hosts h where ht.templateid=10334 and ht.hostid = h.hostid and h.host like "$database%";
